text:
Hi,

i download chainsaw tool in my PC, however i am trying to connect to remote jboss server, not find any document related to it, could you please tell me how to connect to remote jboss 5.0 and jboss 7.x versions, chainsaw 2 installed in my PC. i am trying to connect remote jboss servers which are installed in linux environments.

please help me.

-Subbu
creator: subramanyam.aregala@gmail.com

text:
This isn't a bug, but a request for assistance...please send an email to the log4j-users mailing list.  Information on the mailing list is available here:
http://logging.apache.org/log4j/1.2/mail-lists.html
creator: sdeboy@iname.com
